scripts.unit-tests: nyc --source-type=module --reporter=text --all npm run -s unit-faucet && nyc report --reporter=html && nyc check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100
scripts.test: npm run -s lint && npm run -s unit-tests
scripts.test-ci: npm run -s lint && nyc --reporter=text-lcov --all --check-coverage --lines 100 npm run -s unit-faucet | coveralls
scripts.commit-new-version: git add --all && git commit -m $npm_package_version -m '(Autogenerated, please update !)'
scripts.bump-version: echo Have you updated the version number ? If not please Ctrl-C NOW ! && read test
scripts.new-version: npm run -s bump-version && npm run -s test && npm run -s docs && npm run -s new-git-tag && npm run -s commit-new-version
